title: Fey Ancestry
content:
ired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.

Fey Ancestry Information

The Feywild casts a veil over your mind. You have Advantage on Saving Throws against being Charmed, and magic can't put you to Sleep.

How to unlock Fey Ancestry

Fey Ancestry can be acquired by: Elf, Drow, Half-Elf

Elf, Drow, Half-Elf

Fey Ancestry Tips & Notes

Notes & Tips go here

Traits and Features Ability Drain ♦ Abjuration Savant ♦ Absorb Elements ♦ Acolyte of Nature ♦ Action Surge ♦ Adamantine Skin ♦ Ad
